description: Try our easy to follow Soy Caramel Roasted Pear Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Soy Caramel Roasted Pear Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Just before serving cheesecake, arrange pears in sauce on top of the cheesecake and serve with extra whipped cream.
